name: Chrono Guy and the Fabled Time Cup
name_original: Chrono Guy and the Fabled Time Cup
description:
Chrono Guy and the Fabled Time Cup is a curious puzzle-platformer that has you running, jumping and time warping typically-impossible dungeons, had you been a typically-normal person. 

Take control of Chrono Guy, young wizard practicing the hidden arts of Time Magic, and make your way through the Temple of Yesterday, with your powers to reverse time. 

ANY objects that have moved, can be rewind - including yourself.

REWIND

Missed your step? Turn back time. Gate just closed? Turn back time. Impending death from oncoming boulder? Turn back time.

Putting the retry in a literal manner, you can rewind objects to their previous positions and exploit the timeline to your favour. Be mindful though - as an aspiring time wizard, you can only exert your influence one object at a time, and only for so long. 

Rethink, retry, rewind.

CONTROLS 

Classic platformer meets time travel - There is a tutorial in-game that better introduces the mechanics - these are here for convenience.

  • <A, D> for movement.
  • <Spacebar> to jump.
  • <Mouse and Left Mouse Button> to select and REWIND objects.
  • <R> to restart anytime - useful if you're stuck, or bugs, or just quick REWIND.

This game is submitted for the Brackeys Game Jam with the theme : REWIND. This has been a blast - and for those that have enjoyed my game, thanks for playing!
